milestones.label: hold
milestones.description: The hand is holding the Rubik's cube in a stationary position.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The hand releases the cube into the air for a toss.

milestones.label: apex
milestones.description: The Rubik's cube reaches the peak of its flight trajectory.

milestones.label: catch
milestones.description: The hand makes contact with and catches the falling cube.

milestones.label: stabilize
milestones.description: The hand secures the cube firmly after the catch.
